name: moviefacts
0:
”Alexa, ask movie facts to amuse me”
”Alexa, ask movie facts for something fun”
”Alexa, ask movie facts to tell me a fun fact on movies”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie facts
des: You can say, "Alexa, ask movie facts to amuse me" or "Alexa, ask movie facts for something fun" or "Alexa, ask movie facts to tell me a fun fact on movies". Then, Alexa would respond with an interesting movie fun fact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
